mapper.select: select p.name, region_2depth as location, pk.kind as place_kind, rating, (select count(*) from review where place_no=p.no) as review_count, p.price_high as price from place p left outer join place_kind pk on p.place_kind_code = pk.no

select p.name, m.name as host_name, pk.kind as place_kind, p.description, p.price_High, p.checkin_Time_Start, p.checkin_Time_End, p.checkout_Time_Start, p.checkout_Time_End, p.address_Name, p.coord_X, p.coord_Y, p.region_1depth, p.region_2depth, p.region_3depth, p.road_Name, p.main_Building_No, p.sub_Building_No, p.building_Name, p.room_Count, p.bathroom_Count, p.bed_Single, p.bed_Double, p.bed_Queen, p.bed_King, p.kitchen, p.parking, p.wifi, p.balcony, p.pool, p.air_Conditioner, p.bathtub, p.crib, p.tv, p.coffee_Machine, p.pc, p.black_Board, p.beam_Project, p.balloon, p.dining_Table, p.lamp, p.kitchen_Tools, p.rating, (select count(*) from review where place_no = p.no) as reviewCount from place p left outer join member m on (p.host_no = m.no) left outer join place_kind pk on (p.place_kind_code = pk.no) where p.no = #{placeNo}
